ygData.subject: Research
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, I love my Necromancer (Quellious Server) but I have to admit that research is a pain. My druid is lvl 61 and it was never this hard to get my spells. My
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, I love my Necromancer (Quellious Server) but I have to admit that
research is a pain. My druid is lvl 61 and it was never this hard to
get my spells. My druid gets EXP easy to by "snare, root, and triple
dotting"... where as with my Necromancer I have to either snare/dot
and gain agro off my pet and run it around chasing me or fear kite
it.

It's almost as if EQ is creating characters for each person's
personality. Bards for those who when fighting love to key many keys.
Necromancer for the quest type lovers, and Druid for those who love
the easy way and to chat more than play. plus, Clerics for those who
want to simply help group members but spend more time sitting
around... amoung other classes. Even Monks for karate loving people!

Alexandrah (Druid)
Justene (Necromancer)
Alexis (Bard)
Beverly (BeastLord)



._.~*~._.~*~.Beverly R._.~*~._.~*~.

are locked up."
